item.title: 199- Bass Travel NIGHTMARE… what NOT to do!
item.description: Ian and Sharon swap travel horror stories and share their biggest lessons from years of touring and bass travel. From packing light to gate check debates, things get real (and occasionally frustrating). Expect strong opinions, a few surprises, and plenty of what not to do next time you fly. Feed: https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/2084361.rss

item.title: Putting on Your Learning Glasses - Thoughts from Kevin
item.description: Are you wearing your learning glasses? ???? In this episode of Remarkable TV, Kevin Eikenberry shares how changing your perspective can turn everyday moments—whether frustrating or joyful—into powerful learning opportunities. From handling... Feed: https://remarkablepodcast.libsyn.com/rss
